nodes.text: Sana-Rae was a female Voss from the planet of the same name. A Voss Mystic, she was also member of the Eternal Alliance, leading its Force Enclave, a school for the nurturing of Force-sensitives' Force powers. She chose to join the enclave due to a vision, and sought to unite fellow Mystics, Jedi, and Sith under the school's tutelage, as she believed in a balance between the light and dark sides of the Force.

Being a Voss, and thus not aligned to either "side" of the Force, Sana-Rae was well respected by her peers, able to build up a coalition of Sith and Jedi alike, giving the Eternal Alliance a great advantage over the Galactic Republic and Sith Empire's Force wielders.
